--- title: "Difference-in-Differences" author: "Sriramkumar Sarida" --- # Study of New Admission procedure in hospitals ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## Load the data frame ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_a7ba60378936c093e4b47fb2a97ac068'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(dplyr) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #> #> filter, lag ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #> #> intersect, setdiff, setequal, union ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} hospital_data <- readRDS("../../data/hospdd.rds") ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_a654b5ab7cc4d241ab89352125090363'} ```{.r .cell-code} head(hospital_data) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_2879ff3a10527582d25ef421cbdff693'} ```{.r .cell-code} summary(hospital_data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> hospital frequency month procedure #> Min. : 1.00 Min. :1.000 Min. :1.000 Min. :0.0000 #> 1st Qu.:11.00 1st Qu.:1.000 1st Qu.:1.750 1st Qu.:0.0000 #> Median :23.00 Median :2.000 Median :3.500 Median :0.0000 #> Mean :22.84 Mean :2.473 Mean :3.625 Mean :0.2079 #> 3rd Qu.:35.00 3rd Qu.:4.000 3rd Qu.:5.250 3rd Qu.:0.0000 #> Max. :46.00 Max. :4.000 Max. :7.000 Max. :1.0000 #> satis #> Min. :0.5468 #> 1st Qu.:2.8888 #> Median :3.4975 #> Mean :3.6191 #> 3rd Qu.:4.2405 #> Max. :9.7129 ``` ::: ::: - There are 46 hospitals in total, however only the first 18 seem to be relevant to us. As we want to compute the difference between the treatment and the control group ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_595db43b26d968b528e4004821f016ab'} ```{.r .cell-code} treatment_by_month <- hospital_data %>% group_by(month) %>% summarise(treatment_count = sum(procedure)) # Display the count of treatments by month print(treatment_by_month) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> # A tibble: 7 Ã— 2 #> month treatment_count #> #> 1 1 0 #> 2 2 0 #> 3 3 0 #> 4 4 383 #> 5 5 383 #> 6 6 383 #> 7 7 383 ``` ::: ::: - The exact period when the treatment came into effect is not explicitly shown in the question. To make a better estimate, the data was filtered based on the months to find the sum of the treatment values. So this calculation provides a hint when the new admission procedure was introduced. The treatment came into effect from month 4. ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_5d79fd1fdc77303bae85ce289b468c09'} ```{.r .cell-code} treatment_month = 4 mean_control_before <- hospital_data %>% filter(procedure == 0, month == treatment_month - 1, hospital > 18) %>% summarize(mean_satisfaction = mean(satis, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% pull(mean_satisfaction) mean_treated_before <- hospital_data %>% filter(procedure == 0, month == treatment_month - 1, hospital <= 18) %>% summarize(mean_satisfaction = mean(satis, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% pull(mean_satisfaction) diff_before_treatment = mean_treated_before - mean_control_before diff_before_treatment ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.1134924 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} mean_control_after <- hospital_data %>% filter(procedure == 1, month == treatment_month, hospital > 18) %>% summarize(mean_satisfaction = mean(satis, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% pull(mean_satisfaction) mean_treated_after <- hospital_data %>% filter(procedure == 1, month == treatment_month, hospital <= 18) %>% summarize(mean_satisfaction = mean(satis, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% pull(mean_satisfaction) diff_after_treatment = mean_treated_after - mean_control_after diff_after_treatment ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] NaN ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_18b7001f91b3cd469be3d32cc5d6ec03'} ```{.r .cell-code} counts_treated_group <- hospital_data %>% filter(hospital >= 1, hospital <= 18) %>% group_by(hospital, procedure) %>% summarise(count = n()) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> `summarise()` has grouped output by 'hospital'. You can override using the #> `.groups` argument. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} counts_treated_group ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} counts_control_group <- hospital_data %>% filter(hospital >= 1, hospital > 18) %>% group_by(hospital, procedure) %>% summarise(count = n()) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> `summarise()` has grouped output by 'hospital'. You can override using the #> `.groups` argument. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} counts_control_group ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_69d439b76d4c9760d92bfe39560d2b14'} ```{.r .cell-code} did_estimate <- diff_after_treatment - diff_before_treatment did_estimate ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] NaN ``` ::: ::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## Linear Regression Model ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_610990018fda53bfa2f5290160a50b87'} ```{.r .cell-code} model_numeric <- lm(satis ~ month + hospital, data = hospital_data) model_numeric ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> lm(formula = satis ~ month + hospital, data = hospital_data) #> #> Coefficients: #> (Intercept) month hospital #> 3.75972 0.07207 -0.01760 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_c154fc1923b7c9d60236229f2706936b'} ```{.r .cell-code} model <- lm(satis ~ as.factor(month) + as.factor(hospital), data = hospital_data) model ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> lm(formula = satis ~ as.factor(month) + as.factor(hospital), #> data = hospital_data) #> #> Coefficients: #> (Intercept) as.factor(month)2 as.factor(month)3 #> 3.419332 -0.009608 0.021969 #> as.factor(month)4 as.factor(month)5 as.factor(month)6 #> 0.349354 0.343235 0.348800 #> as.factor(month)7 as.factor(hospital)2 as.factor(hospital)3 #> 0.341444 0.408566 0.533625 #> as.factor(hospital)4 as.factor(hospital)5 as.factor(hospital)6 #> 0.227510 -0.145353 0.447863 #> as.factor(hospital)7 as.factor(hospital)8 as.factor(hospital)9 #> 1.404416 0.071876 -1.518515 #> as.factor(hospital)10 as.factor(hospital)11 as.factor(hospital)12 #> 1.682845 0.220965 -0.095303 #> as.factor(hospital)13 as.factor(hospital)14 as.factor(hospital)15 #> 0.495593 0.233043 -0.144494 #> as.factor(hospital)16 as.factor(hospital)17 as.factor(hospital)18 #> 1.414268 0.423543 0.153276 #> as.factor(hospital)19 as.factor(hospital)20 as.factor(hospital)21 #> -1.169296 -0.376607 0.770343 #> as.factor(hospital)22 as.factor(hospital)23 as.factor(hospital)24 #> 0.375321 0.277726 -0.732120 #> as.factor(hospital)25 as.factor(hospital)26 as.factor(hospital)27 #> 0.222480 -0.209747 -0.822648 #> as.factor(hospital)28 as.factor(hospital)29 as.factor(hospital)30 #> 0.288001 -0.175443 -0.591916 #> as.factor(hospital)31 as.factor(hospital)32 as.factor(hospital)33 #> 0.088091 -0.747340 -0.877969 #> as.factor(hospital)34 as.factor(hospital)35 as.factor(hospital)36 #> -0.424406 -0.069883 1.714149 #> as.factor(hospital)37 as.factor(hospital)38 as.factor(hospital)39 #> -0.283590 -0.510800 -0.447491 #> as.factor(hospital)40 as.factor(hospital)41 as.factor(hospital)42 #> 0.697539 -0.573729 0.457143 #> as.factor(hospital)43 as.factor(hospital)44 as.factor(hospital)45 #> -1.196426 -0.389582 -0.637743 #> as.factor(hospital)46 #> -0.345502 ``` ::: ::: - R would treat both the month and hospital as numeric variables and assuming a linear relationship. On the other hand, with **as.factor** each unique month and hospital are treated as separate categories, allowing for difference intercept for each one as we see from the result. ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_fb50cb45992c5c9896a8957381d3862e'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Load tidyverse package library(tidyverse) # Function to simulate data generate_data <- function( S = 2, # number of groups P = 10, # number of periods D_size = 1, # effect of treatment D_time = NULL, # time of treatment y_0 = 50, # base value for y sd = 1, # standard deviations for randomly generated sequences scenario = c("A", "B") ){ # create group period dyads s <- rep(0:1, each = P) p <- rep(1:P, S) # timing and size of treatment (effect) delta <- D_size if (missing(D_time)) D_time <- P/2 after <- as.numeric(ifelse(p > D_time, 1, 0)) # create relation between independent variables and treatment (actually # other way round, but easier to simulate this way) x1 <- rnorm(S*P, s, sd) # create dependent variable ... # ... for scenario (A) y_a <- y_0 + delta*s*after + 1/5*p + x1 + rnorm(S*P, 0, sd) # ... for scenario (B) y_b <- y_0 + delta*s*after + 1/5*p + x1 + s*x1 + 1/3*p*x1 + rnorm(S*P, 0, sd) # add variables to table df <- tibble( treat = s, period = p, after = after, x1 = x1, sales = if (scenario == "A") {y_a} else {y_b} ) # return table return(df) } ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_41e7b2baa87461e43b54de5db02b1f22'} ```{.r .cell-code} P <- 10 # number of periods delta <- 1 # true treatment effect df_A <- generate_data(P = P, D_size = delta, sd = 0.01, scenario = "A") summary(df_A) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> treat period after x1 sales #> Min. :0.0 Min. : 1.0 Min. :0.0 Min. :-0.017317 Min. :50.20 #> 1st Qu.:0.0 1st Qu.: 3.0 1st Qu.:0.0 1st Qu.:-0.002062 1st Qu.:51.15 #> Median :0.5 Median : 5.5 Median :0.5 Median : 0.499945 Median :51.58 #> Mean :0.5 Mean : 5.5 Mean :0.5 Mean : 0.499671 Mean :51.85 #> 3rd Qu.:1.0 3rd Qu.: 8.0 3rd Qu.:1.0 3rd Qu.: 1.004141 3rd Qu.:52.30 #> Max. :1.0 Max. :10.0 Max. :1.0 Max. : 1.011962 Max. :54.01 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} df_A_zoom_in <- df_A %>% filter(period %in% (P/2):(P/2+1)) df_A_zoom_in ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} before_control_A <- df_A_zoom_in %>% filter(treat == 0, after == 0) %>% pull(sales) before_treatment_A <- df_A_zoom_in %>% filter(treat == 1, after == 0) %>% pull(sales) before_control_A ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 51.01902 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} before_treatment_A ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 52.00429 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} diff_before_A <- before_treatment_A - before_control_A diff_before_A ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 0.9852735 ``` ::: :::
